Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimizing a linear objective function subject to linear constraints.
Appearances: Maximizing profit for a company based on production levels.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimizing a linear objective function subject to linear constraints with integer variable restrictions.
Appearances: Production planning where the number of items to produce must be an integer.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimizing a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints.
Appearances: Portfolio optimization (minimizing variance for a given expected return)

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimizing a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Breaking down a complex problem into smaller overlapping subproblems and solving them recursively.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimizing a convex function subject to linear or convex constraints.

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Optimizing a decision under uncertainty with probabilistic inputs.
column8: Supply chain management under uncertain demand

Name: Robust Optimization
Description: Optimizing a decision while accounting for uncertainty in the parameters.
Appearances: Designing a bridge considering uncertain loads and material properties.

Name: Evolutionary Algorithms
Solvability: genetic algorithms) to find optimal solutions.

Name: Game Theory Optimization
Description: Finding the optimal strategy in a game or competitive setting.

Name: Multiobjective Optimization
Appearances: Designing a car to maximize fuel efficiency and safety.

Name: Constraint Programming
Description: Solving complex problems by defining constraints and looking for solutions that satisfy them.

Name: Portfolio Optimization (Specific Variations)
Description: Specialized LP or QP formulations for specific portfolio optimization scenarios.
Appearances: Investing based on risk aversion and expected returns.

Name: Robust Control
Description: Designing controllers that are robust to uncertainties in the system dynamics.

Name: Metaheuristic Optimization
Description: A broad class of heuristics that attempt to find good solutions to complex optimization problems. (e.g. Simulated Annealing
